description.brief: A property sheet control for wxWidgets
description.p: wxpropgrid provides an easy way of editing properties in wxWidgets. This package contains a patched version of 1.4.7. 1.4.7 fixed a bad crash we were experiencing, as well as a lot of problems on OSX.

We apply four patches:
fixes some scrollbar problems we were having. The patch is submitted back: link
changes it to not snap back to selection all the time. bug reported: link
adds the ability to set the font per cell. feature requested: link
does not clear selection every time Append/AppendIn is called. feature requested: link
